overview: Adult toy saleswoman Madelyn just made the pitch of her life, and her client wants a demonstration of the products. Sandy is a boss with a bad attitude. When one of her workers stands up to her, a cat fight erupts. Sandee goes to a strip club with her co-workers to pursue a business partner. 9 people have turned up dead in the same cheap motel. The only evidence is a card from an escort service. Ashley is a tough drill sergeant who loves breaking down sexy, young recruits.
title: Hot and Mean
